name: Code Review Bot
body:
# Review
No change requests.
## Summary of Changes
- Updated the code review bot Docker image version in `.gitlab-ci.yml`.
- Adjusted background color in web manifests for both `cc` and `sz` apps to match the login page nav bar gray.
- Modified viewport meta tag in `index.html` to disable user scaling for improved mobile UX.
- Minor formatting cleanup in `index.html` regarding `<noscript>` content.
- Added artifact collection paths for code review outputs.

## Overall Feedback
Looking at this MR, I can see you're working on PWA improvements for mobile UX, particularly focusing on visual consistency and control. @aemig_mrs 

The changes seem straightforward - updating manifest colors, disabling user scaling, and adding some padding. üëç

I noticed there are some binary image files changed but no actual code changes shown in the diffs for those. The web manifest and HTML changes look good from a functionality standpoint!

Let me know if there's anything specific you'd like me to focus on during this test of the new code review bot setup! üöÄ
